brief_title: To Evaluate the Cardiac Safety of Pegylated Liposomal Doxorubicin Concurrently Plus Trastuzumab and Pertuzumab in the Adjuvant Setting for Early-stage HER-2-positive Breast Cancer: a Multicenter, Randomized Controlled Clinical Study
brief_summary: To evaluate the safety and efficacy of pegylated liposomal doxorubicin/cyclophosphamide/trastuzumab/pertuzumab followed by docetaxel/ trastuzumab/pertuzumab compared with epirubicin/cyclophosphamide followed by docetaxel/trastuzumab/pertuzumab in the adjuvant treatment of early breast cancer.
